Name: STRIKER of SKY
About the game: Multi-play using VR devices - Drone soccer official game rules and actual measurement-based stadiums and play environments Implemented to provide an experience similar to playing in the field. Customizable characters, drones and stadium environment reflecting local characteristics - You can decorate your own character and drone, You can play in stadiums decorated with city concepts of Seoul, Daejeon, and Jeonju city. Supports various controllers when flying drones - When controlling the flight of the drone, not only the VR controller, but also the keyboard, gamepad and Frsky flight controller You can operate your drone.
Meta Title: STRIKER of SKY: Feb 20, 2023, AR-BRIDGE and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on STRIKER of SKY? Check out the release date (Feb 20, 2023), developer insights from AR-BRIDGE, and a complete game summary.
